articles.description: The fund had announced the first close at $60 million in November last year.
articles.content:
Fireside Ventures has raised $118 million (Rs 863 crore) toward the final close of its second fund, including a $18 million (Rs 113 crore) green shoe option, its top executive said.
The early-stage … [+2907 chars]

articles.title: Tata Motors jumps 51% in Jan on Tesla tie-up buzz; firm denies rumour - Business Standard
articles.description: In the past seven trading days, the stock has rallied 26 per cent on report that Tesla may choose Tata Motors for its much-awaited India foray
articles.content: Shares of Tata Motors continued their northward march, with the stock hitting its fresh 28-month high of Rs 278, up 7 per cent on the BSE in the intra-day trade on Wednesday. The rally was supported … [+2673 chars]

articles.title: L&T Technology Services to roll out salary hikes - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: While junior employees will get their increments effective April 1, senior employees’ salary increases will be rolled out in July.
articles.content: Engineering services firm L&T Technology Services will roll out salary increments for its employees effective April 1, 2021. This comes at the back of the growth momentum the company is seeing in… [+3764 chars]
